other_title: カードファイト!!ヴァンガードG ストライドゲート編 (Japanese)
plot: Team TRY3: Chrono, Shion, and Tokoha, managed to win the championship of Generation Quest. In the mean time, however, Ryuzu Myōjin has a secret plan: summoning Zodiac Time Beasts of Gear Chronicle clan to Earth. Chrono and Kōji want to stop Ryuzu, but they are confronted by a mysterious group of cardfighters known as "Company" who share Ryuzu's ideology.
ending_theme: "High Touch Memory" (ハイタッチ☆メモリー) by Yui Ogura
